title: WRD Maharashtra Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Legal Officer Post
description: Maharashtra Water Resource Department (WRD) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Legal Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree, LLB, can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and hw to apply for the WRD Maharashtra  Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application...
